title: Suggestion for backgrounds
body:
So currently in the 'Profile' tab, the background is set to the splash-art of your highest Mastery Score champion. 

Would it be possible to change the background art by selecting the champion icon on that tab, and secondly, would it be possible to choose which of those champion splash-arts are displayed?

As an example, mine is currently Vel'Koz

https://imgur.com/s1gTYtP

Could I choose between the classic, Arclight, Battlecast and Definitely Not splash-arts?

Could I choose, instead of Vel'Koz, Sona or Garen splash-arts (possibly animated too)?

replies.body:
You can read a bit more about the new profiles & client update [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/ab6a77f2-6c5f-4981-97d4-a541f9c11de7) (in the Styling and Profiling section)

TL;DR - the profile background feature is designed to roughly follow the functionality in the existing client - by default the updated client will show your most frequently played champion (not necessarily highest mastery).  BUT, you can customise it If you use a summoner icon from an ultimate skin.

I'll set mine to an ultimate now, so if anyone is interested, you can look me up and see what it looks like!

Let me know what you think!

Cheers
Mindstar

I get what both of you are saying. To add, what about using an icon that is not an ultimate skin would change the background. Example: Any of the project icons (Zed, Fiora, Leona and Yi) the background would be the splash for that champion skin (same would go for the Dark Star and Battlecast icons, sion so forth). Other icons like the Draven Draven icon can have the Draven Draven and friends art that was featured on the loading screen on your profile overview. The kindred icon for kindred, the blood moon kalista for blood moon kalista, the mecha icon for the mecha and friends splash, Chinese new year icon for the respected character if not loading screen art that it was used for or debonair for the debonairs, urf icon for the urf loading screen picture, bildgewater event, there is so many out there I can think of. 

I think it is an interesting thing to enable because it gives more customisable option for the users. Not everyone will have the same icon and background, some people will have rare icons, some people can support their favourite teams like Team Liquid, Dire Wolves, SKT1 as an icon, but can have the wallpaper art thing on their profile if they use that icon. 

TL;DR some icons that are released with a specific theme would show that theme as the profile background picture (e.g. team icons, event, champion icons) weather it be the picture from a loading screen from that event by using said icon, a specific champ/skinned champ icon to background picture. Giving users the ability to customise their profile to be different to others out there.

Riot have their own plan and are not open to other peoples ideas, this I become more certain of with every red post I read. You have a great idea! But doing this will make skins like DJ Sona less unique, and so Riot won't be helpful here. I doubt this will get a second reply. They just dismiss it like it's nothing.
For this I highly recommend that you allow people to choose their own champion for the background, so they could choose their favorites etc...

But what about champions that don't, and possibly won't ever, have an ultimate skin but do already have animated splash-art?

Good choice on Concussive Sona btw :D

maybe have it so that you can only choose from a splash if you OWN the skin.. so skins dont lose their uniqueness thing... also imagine having black alistar and not being able to show it off on your profile{{champion:12}} {{item:3070}}

It'd be a lot more unique to each profile if you see the most played champion + skin, not just the champion by itself. I know only the Ultimate Skins have that option, but can you extend it to all Skins, and make Ultimate Skins the only ones with an animated background, whereas all the others are still skin backgrounds.
